extends java.lang.Object

save

public void save()
Save the repository data to an XML file. @see Repository#load()

load

public void load()
Load the repository from disk (from an XML file written by XMLEncoder). The path to the file comes from the general configuration.

addSong

private void addSong(java.lang.String group,
                     java.lang.String song)
Add a song to the repository in a given group. The concrete songclass (i.e. Mp3Song is determined by the file extension.

Parameters:
group -
song -

songsOfGroup

private java.util.Collection songsOfGroup(java.lang.String dirName)
Get the songs in a given group as a new Collection (One that can be changed without changing the underlying group). If the group doesn't exist, an empty collection (HashSet) is returned.

Parameters:
dirName -
Returns:

nextId

private long nextId()
Get the next to be used id for a song. This counter will only go up, no two songs should ever have the same id in history.

Returns:
